mainContent.heading: What is the Trust Badges Slider Section?
paragraphs: The Trust Badges Slider section helps strengthen customer confidence by visually displaying trust signals such as security badges, payment icons, certifications, or guarantees.
By placing trust elements in a smooth sliding layout, the section reinforces credibility without taking up too much space or distracting from the main content.
It can be added to product pages, cart pages, or the homepage to reduce hesitation and encourage customers to complete their purchase with confidence.

features.title: Navigation Controls

features.title: Slider Configuration
features.description: Choose how many badges appear per row and control the sliding behavior.

features.title: Image Styling
features.description: Adjust image width, aspect ratio, borders, and visual appearance.

features.title: Responsive Spacing
features.description: Control padding and spacing to ensure a balanced layout across all devices.
